Function Documentation

HashAnchorTableEntry createHATEntry ( int  iptIndex  ) 

Creates an hash anchor table entry out of an inverted page table index.

Parameters:
iptIndex the IPT index which determines the HAT Entry.

int32_t getHashAnchorTableIndex ( int32_t  ASID,
int32_t  VPN 
)

Hash-function that transforms the ASID and VPN to an anchor table index.

Parameters:
ASID the ASID to integrate in hash
VPN the VPN to integrate in hash

HashAnchorTableEntry getHATEntry ( int32_t  hatIndex  ) 

Returns the hash anchor table entry of the given index in the hash anchor table. The hash anchor table entry is the index in the inverted page table.

Parameters:
hatIndex the HAT index to be transformed

void initHashAnchorTable (  ) 

Initialize the hash anchor table with ILLEGALHATENTRY's.

Checks if the hash anchor table entry is illegal.

Parameters:
hatEntry the HAT Entry to be verified

BOOL isIllegalHATIndex ( int32_t  hatIndex  ) 

Checks if the hash anchor table index is illegal.

Parameters:
hatIndex the HAT index to be verified

HashAnchorTableEntry  hatEntry 
)

Set HAT entry if HAT index and HAT entry are not illegal.

Parameters:
hatIndex the HAT index at which the HAT Entry is set
hatEntry the HAT entry that is be set

BOOL setIllegalHATEntry ( int32_t  hatIndex  ) 

Set an ILLEGAL HAT entry if the given HAT index is not illegal.

Parameters:
hatIndex the HAT index at which the ILLEGAL HAT Entry is set
